title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         A visit to the statue of President Van Buren in the Village of Kinderhook (and your photo sitting next to him) is a must.Â  The statue was a gift to the Village from the Friends of Lindenwald in 2007. National Park Service  Tours, Activities, Events, Attractions    There are tours and events which take place throughout the year at Martin Van Buren NHS. In addition, there are numerous opportunities for recreation, learning and diversion in the nearby Villages of Kinderhook and Valatie and throughout Columbia County.
